snippet: Egyptian security agencies have stopped the screening of a documentary on Jews in Egypt a day before it was to debut in local cinemas, the film’s producer said Tuesday in a statement.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian security agencies have stopped the screening of a documentary on Jews in Egypt a day before it was to debut in local cinemas, the film’s producer said Tuesday in a statement.

headline.main: Egypt: Film on Egyptian Jews Is Blocked
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Film on Egyptian Jews Is Blocked
